Tasks.Task Description: Continuously monitor the performance of deployed AI models, analyzing metrics such as accuracy, latency, and throughput to ensure optimal operation.
Regularly review and update AI models based on new data, performance metrics, and user feedback to maintain relevance and accuracy.

Tasks.Task: Conduct Regular Backups of AI Projects
Tasks.Task Description: Execute and verify regular backups of AI project configurations, models, and data to ensure recovery in case of failure.

Tasks.Task: Manage Access and Security for AI Resources
Tasks.Task Description: Regularly review and update access controls for AI resources, ensuring compliance with security policies and protecting sensitive data.
Analyze resource usage patterns for AI workloads and optimize configurations to improve performance and reduce costs.
After deploying AI models, conduct reviews to assess performance, gather feedback, and identify areas for improvement.
Keep documentation up-to-date, including project configurations, model details, and operational procedures to ensure clarity and compliance.

Tasks.Task: Implement Security Measures for AI Data
Tasks.Task Description: Ensure that all AI data is encrypted in transit and at rest, and implement necessary security measures such as VPNs for sensitive data access.
